/api/v1/keywords/enhanced.description: Enhanced keyword analysis with maximum suggestions

keywords.description: Maximum number of primary keywords to analyze

max_suggestions_per_keyword.description: Maximum keyword suggestions per seed keyword (up to 150 for comprehensive research)
max_suggestions_per_keyword.note: This generates related keywords, questions, and topics automatically

include_serp.description: Include SERP scrape preview (slower but more comprehensive)

/api/v1/keywords/enhanced.expected_total_keywords: Up to 200 primary keywords Ã— 150 suggestions = 30,000 potential keywords (capped at 200 total in response)

/api/v1/keywords/analyze.description: Standard keyword analysis (routes to enhanced if max_suggestions_per_keyword provided)

keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to analyze

max_suggestions_per_keyword.description: If provided, automatically routes to enhanced analysis for better results

limit.description: Maximum number of keyword suggestions to return (up to 150 for comprehensive research)

max_keywords.description: Maximum keywords to extract (up to 200 for comprehensive research)

seed_keywords.description: Seed keywords to base recommendations on

max_topics.description: Maximum number of topics to return

include_ai_suggestions.description: Use Claude AI for intelligent topic generation

most_comprehensive.note: This gives you the most comprehensive keyword research with SERP analysis

maximum_keywords.note: Up to 200 primary keywords, each generating up to 150 suggestions

maximum_suggestions.note: Get up to 150 keyword variations for a single keyword

curl_examples.enhanced_max:
curl -X POST 'https://blog-writer-api-dev-613248238610.europe-west9.run.app/api/v1/keywords/enhanced' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "keywords": ["pet grooming", "dog care"],
    "location": "United States",
    "language": "en",
    "max_suggestions_per_keyword": 150,
    "include_serp": false
  }'

notes.testing_mode: In testing mode, limits may be reduced automatically
notes.rate_limits: Rate limits may apply for high-volume requests
notes.response_time: Higher max values = longer response times
notes.cost: Higher max values may consume more API credits
